## BlinnLightModel.directBRDF() method

Calculates BRDF for direct lighting for current fragment

**Signature:**

```typescript
/** @override */
directBRDF(scope: PBInsideFunctionScope, lightDir: PBShaderExp, attenuation: PBShaderExp): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  scope | [PBInsideFunctionScope](doc/markdown/./device.pbinsidefunctionscope.md) | The shader scope |
|  lightDir | [PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md) | Vector from the light position to current fragment |
|  attenuation | [PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md) | Attenuation of the light |

**Returns:**

void
